body: Hello Chris! I am using this component "Set EP natural ventilation" for natural ventilation, but I don't know exactly how to connect it to my model. I have a 5 room model, and all the zones are connected to the solve adjacencies component. I tried to connect all the 5 zones to the "_HB ZONES" at "Set EP natural ventilation", but it does not worked, and I got this error: 1. Solution exception:Cannot create instances of Brep because it has no public constructors
